data.name: Fixed Twitch Interface
data.description: Twitch has been redesigned and now (september 2019) it has many bugs, which are fixed in this style sheet. If something works wrong - please contact me on twitch (https://www.twitch.tv/brhzrd) or in discord (Beerhazard#2639)

data.name: MeWe++ Fluid Auto Multi Columns
data.description: Make MeWe use automatic multi-columns for stream posts. No sidebars.

data.description: Muestra una palomita a todos nuestros cursos terminado. Actualmente el estilo no es de mucho ayuda visual para diferenciarlos en las rutas de aprendizaje.

data.name: Hacker News - Bluish Gray (2020)
data.description:
Bluish Gray Hacker News. I recommend installing it with Stylus.

GitHub Repository - Feel free to collaborate!
UserCSS - Install the UserCSS style (which supports automatic updates and customization)

Check out my other style - Dark Google Calendar Hit me up with any hints if something could be improved

data.name: Dark Digitales Register
data.description:
Dark mode for the school register used in south tyrol.
If you want to contribute, change, fix something feel free to do so and contact me through my website or Discord.
Also important note: No. It's plain CSS, it's not going to change the way you communicate with the servers, it's not going to magically make a 10 appear in you grades.

https://denismignanelli.now.sh/

data.name: Fate Google Logo
data.description: It just changes the Google Logo to this picture :D

data.name: 哔哩哔哩深色化Bilihub主题
data.description: Bilibili深色化 bilihub 目前的一些想法 1.感觉纯黑并不是太适合眼睛长时间观看，而应该采用深色适配 2.用过的用户会发现动态页的评论和背景会改变成原来的样式，这是因为原页面的vue组件使用了scoped标记，导致标签不断更新而造成的，也算是一个重大BUG 3.以上几点会在本学期期中考试之后进行改进，目前学业繁重，力所不能及的请谅解。 请已安装的用户参照更新内容进行update mrbunker大佬于2020.4.1发布了bilihub 1.0，由于1.0版本有很多细节没做，且不会更新，所以本人亲自更新，进行全局改进，欢迎留言补充bug。 此样式附带功能： √ 去页面推广、广告 √ 对首页排版进行了部分优化
